import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Container, ImageContainer, FormContainer, Footer, Navbar, LogoContainer, Logo, Navigation, Select } from './HomeStyles' import LogoIcon from '../images/pubg.png' export default function Home(props) { const [mode, setMode] = useState() const handleClick = e => { let path = e.target.value props.history.push(`/leaderboards/${path}`) } return ( Home
); }
